entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 8:05 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
